name: Animal Cars Kids Racing Game
summary:
Animal Cars Kids Racing Game is a fun and exciting racing game for young kids and toddlers. With 16 different Animal Cars to choose from, like the cat, dog, lion, penguin, elephant and much more, your child takes control of the animal car with simple controls so it’s easy for them to pick up and play.
18 different worlds to race in, Collect and eat fruit along the way to unlock more animal cars with the prize claw! If your kids love animals and cars, then this game is for them.
